title: Bonus Ep! Talking Bravo Crimes with Sinisterhood
description:
This week we teamed up with true crime podcast Sinisterhood to talk about Bravo crimes — new and forgotten — over the past several years.  What is your favorite Bravo crime?  And which one do you think needs more attention?

This episode was originally released as a bonus ep on Patreon, but we decided we'd put it on our main feed too!  Enjoy!
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
